import smtplib
from email.mime.text import MIMEText

sender_email = "watashiwatet@gmail.com"
password = "sjcbxudofpxivixk"
recipient_email = "ericjhonson09@gmail.com"

smtp_server = "smtp.gmail.com"
smtp_port = 587

subject = f"Sign Detected: {sign}"
body = f"Automated message generated when sign: '{sign}' was detected by Gestura."

msg = MIMEText(body)
msg["Subject"] = subject
msg["From"] = sender_email
msg["To"] = recipient_email

try:
    server = smtplib.SMTP(smtp_server, smtp_port)
    server.starttls()
    server.login(sender_email, password)
    server.sendmail(sender_email, recipient_email, msg.as_string())
    server.quit()
except Exception as e:
    print("Failed to send email:", e)
